attributes.action: hold public referendum to vote on a return of hanging for murder/knife murder
attributes.additional_details:
The murder rates in london accross towns citys uk wide kids carrying knives 
kids being stabbed to death over a postcode or other pathetic reasons 
prison seen as am easy ride we need draconian action murder is despicable hold
attributes.background: We want death penalty returned knife murders are out of hand murder is rife now murder should result in death penalty not a jail cell with a tv murder is as easy as shoplifting today punish it with death penalty
